Name: Horror
Description: Evokes fear, terror, and suspense through supernatural or psychological elements.

Name: Adventure
Description: Filled with thrilling adventures, often set in exotic locations.

Name: Sci-Fi
Description: Explores futuristic and speculative concepts, often involving advanced technology or alien worlds.

Name: Drama
Description: Focuses on character development, emotions, and storytelling.

Name: Family
Description: Suitable for viewers of all ages, often focusing on themes of friendship and adventure.

Name: Action
Description: Action-packed, filled with thrilling sequences and intense battles.
